text: Ke kaloku abahlali basePaladesi baza kukhwaza abahlali baseMlilweni	(bathi):	“Thina	sikufumene	kuyinyaniso oko sakuthenjiswa yiNkosi yethu; ingaba nani nikufumene kuyinyaniso oko iNkosi yenu yanithembisa ngako”? Baya kuthi bona: “Ewe” Umkhwazi uya kumemeza phakathi kwabo:“Isiqalekisosika-Allâhmasibephezukwabagabadeli.”
